discussion.title: Start SR from a given expression
discussion.body:
Hi,

first of all I apologise if this question has been already answered. I used PySR on a large dataset and after some time I've got a nice symbolic expression. However, this is not 100% satisfactory and I want to do more SR to improve on that. 

I do not have the pickle file or the hall_of_fame.csv as I run other regressions after the lucky one so I believe everything has been overwritten. I just have the symbolic expression. Is there a simple way to seed the population with that expression?

nodes.body: Have you checked your `outputs` folder? It shouldn't have been overwritten
